articles.title: Piper Sandler Adjusts PT on American International Group to $95 From $88, Maintains Overweight Rating
articles.mainIdea: Piper Sandler Adjusts PT on American International Group to $95 From $88, Maintains Overweight Rating
articles.summary: MT Newswires: Piper Sandler Adjusts PT on American International Group to $95 From $88, Maintains Overweight Rating. American International Group (AIG) has an average rating of overweight and mean price target of $88.

articles.title: AIG, Amwins and Blackstone form Lloyd’s Syndicate 2479
articles.mainIdea: AIG, Amwins and Blackstone form Lloyd’s Syndicate 2479
articles.summary: Life Insurance International: AIG, Amwins and Blackstone form Lloyd’s Syndicate 2479. The syndicate is scheduled to start underwriting activities on 1 January 2026. Related tickers mentioned: PLTR.

articles.title: Yes, the Trump administration is likely to buy more equity in more private companies in 2026
articles.mainIdea: Yes, the Trump administration is likely to buy more equity in more private companies in 2026
articles.summary: FastCompany: Yes, the Trump administration is likely to buy more equity in more private companies in 2026. Welcome to the new normal for industrial policy.
